historical.title: Historical Data & Analysis
historical.subtitle: Review archived seasons, compare performance across years, and keep data before customer records change.
historical.no_data: No historical data available. Archive seasons to enable historical analysis.
historical.guide_step_1: 1) Set the date range to cover the full season you want to preserve.
historical.guide_step_2: 2) Click "Archive season", name it (ex: 2025 Harvest), and confirm the start/end dates.
historical.guide_step_3: 3) Switch Report Mode to "2025 & Earlier" to view archived seasons.
historical.guide_step_4: 4) For comparisons, select two archived seasons and click Compare.
